original_text: And hath confirmed the same to Jacob for a law, and to Israel for an everlasting covenant,
korean_text: 이는 야곱에게 세우신 율례 곧 이스라엘에게 하신 영원한 언약이라

sentences.original_text: And hath confirmed the same to Jacob for a law
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 야곱에게 법으로 동일한 것을 확정하셨으며

sentences.original_text: and to Israel for an everlasting covenant
